title: Say You Will
lastfmSummary: "Say You Will" is a song by the American rock band Foreigner, released in 1987 as the lead single from their album Inside Information. The song is known for its polished, radio-friendly sound and its blend of rock and pop elements. It became one of Foreigner’s most successful singles of the 1980s, further solidifying their place in mainstream rock music. Title Song "Say You Will" is one of Foreigner’s most iconic tracks from their late 1980s era. Read more on Last.fm.
